item.description:
This is about 89 NM's. But sounds good and worth the trip....

This is from the www.100dollarhamburger.com website:
On the Ramp
Oxford 121

Rest. Phone #: 203-262-0121
Location :
Open: 1130am - 9pm,

OXFORD, CT (WATERBURY-OXFORD - OXC)
-----------------------------
Field Elevation: 726 CTAF: 118.475 FUEL: 100LLA
Runway: 18/36 Length: 5800 Width: 100 Surface:ASPH-G
-------------------------------
PIREP

A truly upscale restaurant almost on the runway. It should be located in NYC. It?s almost too good to be an airport restaurant.


or check out http://www.airnav.com...
